LanguageData.Hediffs_Construction.label: Kenchiku Expertise
LanguageData.Hediffs_Construction.description: Thank you for letting me experience all the flavors of the world!\nKnowledge is power, and what better way to learn than to eat, eat, eat! Kanpai!
